messages.body:
4th December, Nigel Ryan-Schama to Loveth Hutu


Hello Loveth. What a pretty name. How did you get my profile ? Please tell me more about yourself.


 Kindest regards


 Nigel Ryan-Schama

messages.body:
5th December, Loveth Hutu to Nigel Ryan-Schama


Hello Dear,


How was your night over there in your country, I believe you had a nice night and that the atmosphere over there in your country is very nice today? Mine is a little bit warm over here in Dakar Senegal.


My name is Loveth I am (24) but age doesn't matter in a real relationship, so I am comfortable with your age, I am from Rwanda in East Africa,5.4ft tall, fair in complexion single, (never married) and presently I am residing here in Dakar as a result of the civil war that was fought  in my country some years ago.


My late father Dr Salman Hutu was a politician and the managing director of a Gold & Mine Ind in Kigali (the capital of Rwanda) before the rebels attacked our house one early morning and killed my mother and my father in cold blood.


It was only me that is alive now and I managed to make my way to a near by country Senegal where I am leaving now as a refugee under a Reverend father's care and I am using his computer to send these message to you.


I would like to know more about you. Your likes and dislikes, your hobbies and what you are doing presently. I will tell you more about myself in my next mail. Attached here is my picture. I will also like to see yours today!


Hopping to hear from you soonest,


Yours forever,


Miss Loveth.

messages.body:
7th Dec, Nigel Ryan-Schama to Loveth Hutu


Loveth, dearest, great to hear from you but how do you know what country I'm in ? I don't think I've told you that. And I don't think I've told you my age either ? I'll be happy to tell you these things if you wish.


I was saddened to hear about your beloved father, that is a tragic tale indeed.


Loveth, dearest, there was no photo attached to your message. Here is one of me . Please send me two of you - one of your face, and one full length picture of you standing in front of the camera. I can't wait to see it.


Kindest regards
 Nigel Ryan-Schama
messages.raw:
7th Dec, Nigel Ryan-Schama to Loveth Hutu

Loveth, dearest, great to hear from you but how do you know what country I'm in ? I don't think I've told you that. And I don't think I've told you my age either ? I'll be happy to tell you these things if you wish.

I was saddened to hear about your beloved father, that is a tragic tale indeed.

Loveth, dearest, there was no photo attached to your message. Here is one of me [I didn't actually send her anything]. Please send me two of you - one of your face, and one full length picture of you standing in front of the camera. I can't wait to see it.

Kindest regards
Nigel Ryan-Schama

messages.body:
7th Dec, Loveth Hutu to Nigel Ryan-Schama


Dearest one,


I thank you for your response to my mail; in-line with the message I sent to you. Do not be surprise or get offended for receiving this message from me please, Its just that I have been obliged to lay a mere trust on you due to my situation here as a refugee and I will require the best of your honesty after your knowing about me. I will really like us to have a good relationship in spite of anything because I have this feeling that you are not going to betray me at the end.


 I contact you because of the urgency of my situation here in the refugee camp. I am a single daughter of my step-mother back there in Rwanda ( because I am from a polygamous family ). I grew up in Rwanda my country there I had my college certificate and I was admitted into the University there I did my one year curse in business management before the political crisis in my country began. My father was killed by some rebels during the war, they accused my father of coup attempt, and I lost my mother during the war also and so many of my family members our house was burnt down, I lost all my important documents like / international passport / Birth Certificate / University ID card.


 I am constrained to contact you because of the maltreatment I am receiving from my step mother in Rwanda since the death of my parents. She planned to take away all my late father's treasury and properties from me since the unexpected death of my beloved parents.


 So, I decided to run away to any African country so I had to run to where I am presently seeking asylum under the Private charity organization for the UN Refugees here in Dakar, Republic of Senegal. I wish to contact you personally for a long term relationship that may lead us to somewhere better if we work well on it.


 My late father of blessed memory deposited the sum of (US$4,200, 000.00) ( four Million two Hundred Thousand Dollars ) in one of the leading Banks in Europe with my name as the next of kin. However, I shall forward you the contact information of the bank in Europe and some documents for your confirmation in your acceptance to assist me for the transfer and investment of the fund. As you will help me in an investment, and I will like to complete my studies under you, as I was in my 1st year in the university, when the crisis started.


 After the transaction you will arrange for my trip to join you over there in your country for us to share this feelings face to face.


 We will invest the fund, or if you don't intend staying with me then It will be my pleasure to compensate you out of the total money for your services and the balance shall be my investment capital. This is the reason why I decided to contact you. Please all communications should be through this email address only, for confidential purposes.


 As soon as I receive your positive response showing your interest I will put things into action immediately. In the light of the above, I shall appreciate an urgent message indicating your ability and willingness to handle this relationship and transaction sincerely.


 Awaiting your urgent and positive response. Please do keep this only to your self please I beg you not to disclose it to anyone until I come over to your country once the fund has been transferred.


 Meanwhile the name of the Reverend father that I am using his computer to send this messages to you is , his Telephone number is (+221 778788003)  you can call him today and tell him to call me so that you can talk to me please because I want to hear your voice but don't tell him anything about the money, for security reasons, I trust only you and no body else.


Just tell him that you want to speak with Loveth Hutu from Rwanda because there are so many other Nationalities who has one problem or the other in the camp here. God bless you.


Awaiting to hear from you soonest!


Yours forever in love,


Miss Loveth.

messages.body:
7th Dec, Nigel Ryan-Schama to Loveth Hutu


Loveth, thank you for your message. But it's almost as if you didn't read MY message to YOU.


I mentioned the country that I live in , but you ignored that.


I mentioned my age , but you ignored that.


I sent you a photo of me , but you ignored that.


I asked you for photos of yourself, but you ignored that.


Loveth, I really want to help you, but there is no future for our relationship if you don't engage properly in conversation.


I even tried that number you gave me but all I got is a very angry woman shouting and swearing at me in French for some reason. I tried phoning a couple of times, and got the same woman each time, only she seemed to get angrier and angrier each time. Please tell me that was not you ! Was that Reverend Faith's housekeeper ? She sounds like an outrageous woman !


Anyway, write back soon please dearest, but please darling, TALK SENSE !!!


Kindest regards
Nigel Ryan-Schama
messages.raw:
7th Dec, Nigel Ryan-Schama to Loveth Hutu

Loveth, thank you for your message. But it's almost as if you didn't read MY message to YOU.

I mentioned the country that I live in [I actually didn't], but you ignored that.

I mentioned my age [didn't do that either], but you ignored that.

I sent you a photo of me [or that !], but you ignored that.

I asked you for photos of yourself, but you ignored that.

Loveth, I really want to help you, but there is no future for our relationship if you don't engage properly in conversation.

I even tried that number you gave me but all I got is a very angry woman shouting and swearing at me in French for some reason. I tried phoning a couple of times, and got the same woman each time, only she seemed to get angrier and angrier each time. Please tell me that was not you ! Was that Reverend Faith's housekeeper ? She sounds like an outrageous woman !

Anyway, write back soon please dearest, but please darling, TALK SENSE !!!

Kindest regards
Nigel Ryan-Schama

messages.body:
8th Dec, Loveth Hutu to Nigel Ryan-Schama


Hello Dearest One,


I thank you once again this day for your reply to my mails despite your busy schedules in your day to day activities. I will also like to see you face to face and will use this opportunity to let you know that you have been chosen amongst men to help me out from this dungeon despite the little time we have communicated with each other. It is now left for you and God who chooses you to be my deliverer from this predicament I found myself into.


I know you are the man I am going to depend and trust on in my life. I am not going to trust any other man on earth as far as I am still existing. So needless of looking for another partner, you can also adopt me as your daughter if you wish.


 Please I have not told anyone except you about the existence of this money and i will like you to please keep it secret to other people because since it is ( MONEY) all eyes will be on it.


 Remember I trust you that is why I am giving you all this information!. I will like you to call the Rev today and tell him that you want to speak with me and he will send for me immediately. You can call the Reverend today through his phone number ( +221 778788003 ) or his email add ( rev_nicholasfaith@yahoo.com )  his name is Reverend Nicholas Faith and ask him the best time to call me.


 I have informed the bank about my plans to claim this money and the only thing they told me is to look for a foreign partner who will stand on my behalf due to my refugee status and the laws of this country. You will have 18% of the total money for helping me and the remaining money will be managed by you in any business of your choice.


 In this regard I will like you to contact the bank immediately with this information. Tell them that you are my foreign partner and that you want to know the possibilities of assisting me in transferring the ( $4.2 Million US Dollars ) deposited by my late father of which I am the next of kin.


The contact information of the bank is as follows:


 ( CLYDESDALE BANK PLC (GLASGOW IN SCOTLAND )


Email address ( info@clydesdalebankplc-uk.tk ) OR ( operations@clydesdalebankplc-uk.tk ) The name of the transfer manager is Mr JOHN WOOD Banking Hrs 730 am to 5.0 clock pm daily:London time


Telephone contact number   ( +44-7024065466 )
Acc Number: (CBPLC 745008901546/QB/91/A)
Depositor's Name:DR Salman Hutu from (Rwanda).


 Contact them now on how to transfer the $4.2 million Dollars deposited by my late father of which I am the next of kin.


I have mapped out 18% for your assistance and 7% for any expenses that might come up in this transfer. My dear I am glad that God has brought you to see me out from this situation and I promised to be kind and will equally need you in every area of my life plus investing this money since I am still too young to manage this amount of money.


 As I told you before, this camp is just like a prison and my prayers is to move out from here as soon as possible. Please make sure that you contact the bank so that after the transfer you can send some money from that money for me to prepare my traveling documents to meet with you in your country.


Awaiting to hear from you soonest!.


Yours Forever in love,


Miss Loveth

messages.body:
9th Dec, Nigel Ryan-Schama to Rev Nicholas Faith


Hi Reverend


 I have been in contact with Miss Loveth Hutu, who says she knows you, and has asked me to contact you.


Do you know her ? Can you vouch for her ?


Reverend, I have not told Loveth this but, although I have not yet met her, I think I may be in love with her.


I wish to marry her and bring her to Seattle to live with me as my wife.


Do you think this is a good idea ? Is she a virgin ?

Kindest regards
 Nigel Ryan-Schama

I have been in contact with Miss Loveth Hutu, who says she knows you, and has asked me to contact you.

Do you know her ? Can you vouch for her ?

Reverend, I have not told Loveth this but, although I have not yet met her, I think I may be in love with her.

Kindest regards
Nigel Ryan-Schama

messages.body:
9th Dec, Nigel Ryan-Schama to Loveth Hutu


Loveth dear, thanks for your message but you write SO STRANGELY and keep IGNORING what I say ! Thank you for your photo, it was beautiful. Please, let's not focus only on business, let's talk also about you and me. What are your hobbies ? What are your likes and dislikes ? What food do you like to eat ? Are you a vegetarian ? Do you like waffles ?


Write back soonest darling and in the meantime I will get in touch with the reverend. I'm sorry but I don't feel ready to contact the bank yet.

Kindest regards
 Nigel Ryan-Schama

messages.body:
10th Dec, Loveth Hutu to Nigel Ryan-Schama


Hello My Lovely Darling,


How is your present condition of health today over there in your country which is the most important thing to me together with your family and also your work? I hope that God Almighty is taking good care of all your aspects of your life.


Darling, honestly I'm greatly delighted to read your mail and also heard what you said in my previous mail about the transfer of my late fathers's money into your account over there in your country. Meanwhile I want to know if you have contacted the bank which I sent you their information on how to contact them for the transfer of my late father's money into your account over there in your country. Darling, please if you haven't contacted the bank for the transfer I'm imploring begging in the name of God for you to help me to contact the bank today through their email for the transfer. And I want to inform you that I have already informed the bank about you and also told the transfer manager of the bank Mr John Wood that you are my foreign partner who want's to help me to transfer my late father's money into your account over there in your country.


Darling, please try all your possible best to help me to contact the bank today through their email and please tell the bank exactly what I told you that you are my foreign partner who want's to help me to transfer my late father's money into your account over there in your country. Darling, I also want to inform you that the bank will be waiting for you to send them an email for the to confirm that you are my foreign partner seems I have already informed them about you. Please my love, try to help me to contact the bank today through their email for the transfer and please do inform me as soon as you have contacted the bank today for the transfer so that I will know what they say about the transfer. Darling, please this is the bank information below.


( CLYDESDALE BANK PLC (GLASGOW IN SCOTLAND )


Email address ( info@clydesdalebankplc-uk.tk ) OR ( operations@clydesdalebankplc-uk.tk ) The name of the transfer manager is Mr JOHN WOOD Banking Hrs 730 am to 5.0 clock pm daily:London time

Yours forever in love,


Miss Loveth.

11th Dec, Nigel Ryan-Schama to Loveth Hutu


Hi Loveth. Loveth, I told you in my last message that I don't feel ready to contact the bank yet. I DID send a message to the reverend, but he has not replied yet, which is extremely rude of him. Does it not say in the bible "He who is tardy with his e-mails does the devil's work ?" I may have got the words slightly wrong but I'm sure it says something like that.


 Loveth, I really want to get to know you properly as a person before we get into all that boring financial stuff.


Please, let's talk about friendship and love first, the banking can wait.


 Kindest regards my darling
 Nigel Ryan-Schama

messages.body:
14th Dec, Rev Nicholas Faith to Nigel Ryan-Schama


God bless you!


When you help someone it may not return to you in form but God knows what you are doing. God said,whatever you do to the least of them, you do for me." That is why God repays us with countless blessings. Continue to be a blessing for others so that God may be glorified.


 I will like you to try all your best to help this young lady out from this refugee camp,because is not easy here in the camp,people is dieing here every week,we are trying our best but no sponsor,please i will like you to do every thing because of the Almighty GOD in heaven.


 Miss Loveth has told me how you are trying to help her keep it on God will bless you as you help her,i will be with you in prayers. If your heart to marry i will also be with you in any what you need my heart ok, She is a very nice women.


 Take care of your self and Loveth,feel free to contact me any time you like.


Rev Father Nicholas Faith.

messages.body:
15th Dec, Loveth Hutu to Nigel Ryan-Schama


Hello My Darling


How are you doing this after noon and how was your night ? Honey, you, you and you alone... you shall reign in my heart. You are the one I desire without whom I could not be complete. I will live for you alone and I will work for you alone. I will share with you my thoughts, my heart, my mind and my body.


And i will never use force on you not even by words. In your presence, I will always be honest, transparent and sincere. I want always to be at your side.


Also thank you very much for your reply to my mail and i will like you to know that Reverend computer has a problem which was the reason why i could not respond to your email on time and his also . And today is Saturday being a day he attend many visitors in his office which i believe that by Monday or Tuesday he will reply your email because i have told him that you send email to him .


Finally the reason why i am telling you about this transfer mater is that i need this money to be transfer into your account in your country so that you will send me some money in other to get my travailing document in order to come over to your country and meet you . so fill free and contact the bank once you read this email.


Hope to hear from you soon


     Yours Love Loveth

messages.body:
18th Dec, Nigel Ryan-Schama to Loveth Hutu


Dear Loveth, thanks so much for your message, as always it is wonderful to hear from you.


 I am still trying to sort out one or two little details with the reverend, and as soon as he does that, I will be ready to contact the bank.


 In the meantime, let's carry on talking about us.


I would like us to get to know each other much much much much much much much better, so that when we eventually meet, we meet as old friends and not as strangers, know what I mean honey ?


Tell me, what are your likes and dislikes ?


What is your favourite colour ?


What is your favourite type of music, and who is your favourite singer / performer / band / orchestra ?


What is your favourite film ? Your favourite TV program ?


Do you like sport ? Do you prefer to watch it or play it ? If you like to watch, what team or player do you like the most ?


If you like to play yourself, what sports do you play and how good are you ?


What is your favourite food ? Your least favourite food ? your favourite restaurant ? your least favourite restuarant ? Why do you not like it there ? Did you get food poisoning there ? Was the service bad ? Are the other customers rude to you or what ? Did you get splinters from a broken chair ? Do they have mice ?


Tell me about your faith. What exactly is your faith ? I mean I know you ae Christian, but what type of Christian ? What does your faith mean to you ?


Do you follow international politics ? What do you think of President Obama and President Putin ?


 Tell me all of these and much much more, so that I can really get to know you.


And of course if you have any questions like this from me, I will do all I can to answer them.


 Kindest regards and all my love


Nigel Ryan-Schama

I like action firms, movies,comedy and concert and my favorite TV is MBC2.Yes i like sport, and i prefer watching it  and i like Barcelona team and my favorite player is MESSI.My favorite food is Rice,beans, i don't have a favorite restaurant because am in the refugee camp i hope you know that. About my faith, Yes am a christian from Roman Catholic and faith my moderate, I like doing what is good to people which i know God will appreciate and be kind to me, so that means alot to me to do what is good. Please try to contact the bank as soon as possible if you have not and let me informed in your next mail that you have contact the bank for the transfer because i have told them about you as my partner and they are waiting to read from you soonest.


I wish you a blessed day and take a very good care of yourself for me.I will be waiting to read from you soonest.


Yours forever,


Loveth.

messages.body:
21st Dec, Nigel Ryan-Schama to Loveth Hutu


How is my work ? I am retired.


How far have I got with the reverend father ? Absolutely NOWHERE. I have asked him some simple questions and he got kinda angry and now I haven't heard from him for days. Next time you see him, can you politely remind him to answer my questions please ? Thank you so much.


I also haven't contacted the bank. As I have told you before, I need to sort out some little details with the reverend, and once I've done that I will be in touch with the bank IMMEDIATELY.


 Anyway, on to the important stuff.


I was fascinated by your comments. Be assured that I am honest, respectful and responsible. Why, you don't get to my position in life without those things, know what I mean ?


Orange yes ? Orange is good, I think it is my second favourite colour. My absolutely top favourite colour is green, the colour I imagine your eyes to be, but after that orange is probably my second favourite. Isn't that great ?


I must admit I have not heard of Don Moen, I will try and find out about him.


Personally I am a big fan of Slipknot and Lady Gaga, they are my favourite musical artists.


I have heard of Barcelona but I do not know Messi I am afraid, I will look out for him. My favourite sport is Wrestling. Do you get that in your country ?


Loveth, I understand what you say about the refugee camp and how there are no restuarants there. But do you have any memories of restaurants in your country before you were in the refugee camp ? This is really important to me. And you must get some kind of food in the camp. Is it some kind of cafeteria or brasserie perhaps ? Or BBQ ? Do you get rice and beans there ? Maybe a little beef jerky ? grits ? mystery meat ? dom perignon ? twinkies ? I'm really curious about that.


 I'm going to leave chat about religion until Sunday if that's OK with you. I am keen to discuss that with you in detail, but I don't feel holy enough right now. But Sunday I will, OK ?


 Loveth, thanks again so much for writing.


Remain blessed, and endeavour to get that bone-idle reverend to write back to me.

Kindest regards
 Nigel Ryan-Schama

messages.body:
5th Jan, Nigel Ryan-Schama to Loveth Hutu


Dearest Loveth, I am so sorry for not writing for so long. I was in a very severe car crash just before Christmas. I was driving home late one night after a few beers with Rocky, Studs, Quentin, and Luigi, down at the Moose Lodge, when my car skidded on ice and I ended up in the Skamchatwekan River ! The next thing I knew, I woke up in hospital two days later with a punctured lung, broken tibia, broken fibia, broken clamydia, and frostbite in both feet. My car is still in the river, which they tell me has frozen solid so I won't get it back now till May at the earliest, and then it will be in no condition to drive. I'm told that a couple of eskimo dudes rescued me - I haven't met them yet, I'm hoping they will come and visit me here in hospital soon, I owe them a big drink, they saved my life !!! I was slipping in and out of consciousness for the first few days, and only this week have I been able to sit up in bed. Yesterday I managed to get internet access for the first time, and I have been busy catching up.


Loveth, the doctors tell me they expect me to make a full recovery, but that I may be in hospital for the whole of January. I will likely have some scars on my legs and back, but none on my face, and my offense team is still fully functional, if you know what I mean baby ! Least, that's what the doc says.


Loveth, one thing that has really helped me in the last day, is looking at your picture over and over, reading and re-reading your messages, and planning our future together.


I'm so angry that we missed Christmas AND Thanksgiving AND New Year, but at least I'm still alive and looking forward to our golden future together.


Loveth dearest, I have not contacted the bank yet, as I have still not heard from the Reverend. I have sent him another e-mail today to remind him. Loveth, the matter that I am discussing with the Reverend is one that can only be discussed man to man, between a lay man (that's me) and a minister of the church. I can not discuss it directly with you, but please be assured that I am confident that the Reverend will be able to tell me what I need to know. If you see him, would you remind him to reply to me please ?


Loveth, while I've been in hospital, I know I have missed so much. Please send me a long message in reply telling me what you got up to at Christmas and New Year, what are your hopes and dreams for 2013, and any other news you have.


Kindest regards my darling


Nigel Ryan-Schama

5th Jan, Nigel Ryan-Schama to Loveth Hutu

Dearest Loveth, I am so sorry for not writing for so long. I was in a very severe car crash just before Christmas. I was driving home late one night after a few beers with Rocky, Studs, Quentin, and Luigi, down at the Moose Lodge, when my car skidded on ice and I ended up in the Skamchatwekan River ! The next thing I knew, I woke up in hospital two days later with a punctured lung, broken tibia, broken fibia, broken clamydia, and frostbite in both feet. My car is still in the river, which they tell me has frozen solid so I won't get it back now till May at the earliest, and then it will be in no condition to drive. I'm told that a couple of eskimo dudes rescued me - I haven't met them yet, I'm hoping they will come and visit me here in hospital soon, I owe them a big drink, they saved my life !!! I was slipping in and out of consciousness for the first few days, and only this week have I been able to sit up in bed. Yesterday I managed to get internet access for the first time, and I have been busy catching up.

Loveth, the doctors tell me they expect me to make a full recovery, but that I may be in hospital for the whole of January. I will likely have some scars on my legs and back, but none on my face, and my offense team is still fully functional, if you know what I mean baby ! Least, that's what the doc says.

Loveth, one thing that has really helped me in the last day, is looking at your picture over and over, reading and re-reading your messages, and planning our future together.

I'm so angry that we missed Christmas AND Thanksgiving AND New Year, but at least I'm still alive and looking forward to our golden future together.

Loveth dearest, I have not contacted the bank yet, as I have still not heard from the Reverend. I have sent him another e-mail today to remind him. Loveth, the matter that I am discussing with the Reverend is one that can only be discussed man to man, between a lay man (that's me) and a minister of the church. I can not discuss it directly with you, but please be assured that I am confident that the Reverend will be able to tell me what I need to know. If you see him, would you remind him to reply to me please ?

Loveth, while I've been in hospital, I know I have missed so much. Please send me a long message in reply telling me what you got up to at Christmas and New Year, what are your hopes and dreams for 2013, and any other news you have.

Kindest regards my darling

Nigel Ryan-Schama

messages.body:
6th Jan, Loveth Hutu to Nigel Ryan-Schama


My Darling love,


I am really sorry to hear that you have an accident, I didn't know such a thing happened to you,I thank God so much for making you to be alive in the land of living, what would i have done.I also thank the people that rescued you from the accident,i pray God will bless them so much for me. So tell me how you feeling now, i hope you are getting much better, i pray to almighty God who made you to be alive today, will heal you. Please try to follow all the doctors instructions so that you will recover quickly okay. I miss so much all this while.


Honey, I did not celebrate the Christmas because i don't have anything to celebrate with but i thank God almighty who made it possible for me to see the year 2013.My hope and dream this year 2013 is for you to recover quickly and to be with you over there to have a better life together.I wish am already there with you now and take a very good off you by myself in your present condition now, but i know my God will take care of you for me okay. I love you so much and i miss you as well,please take a very good care of yourself for me.


I will be waiting to read from you when you have the strength to write me.


I love you


Loveth.

messages.body:
11th Jan, Loveth Hutu to Mykwile Amzizadique


Hello Dear,

How was your night over there in your country, I believe you had a nice night and that the atmosphere over there in your country is very nice today? Mine is a little bit warm over here in Dakar Senegal. 

My name is Loveth I am (24) but age doesn't matter in a real relationship, so I am comfortable with your age, I am from Rwanda in East Africa,5.4ft tall, fair in complexion single, (never married) and presently I am residing here in Dakar as a result of the civil war that was fought  in my country some years ago.


My late father Dr Salman Hutu was a politician and the managing director of a Gold & Mine Ind in Kigali (the capital of Rwanda) before the rebels attacked our house one early morning and killed my mother and my father in cold blood.


It was only me that is alive now and I managed to make my way to a near by country Senegal where I am leaving now as a refugee under a Reverend father's care and I am using his computer to send these message to you.


I would like to know more about you. Your likes and dislikes, your hobbies and what you are doing presently. I will tell you more about myself in my next mail. Attached here is my picture. I will also like to see yours today!


Hopping to hear from you soonest,


Yours forever,


Miss Loveth.

messages.body:
12th Jan, Loveth Hutu to Mykwile Amzizadique


Dearest one,


I thank you for your response to my mail; in-line with the message I sent to you. Do not be surprise or get offended for receiving this message from me please, Its just that I have been obliged to lay a mere trust on you due to my situation here as a refugee and I will require the best of your honesty after your knowing about me. I will really like us to have a good relationship in spite of anything because I have this feeling that you are not going to betray me at the end.


 I contact you because of the urgency of my situation here in the refugee camp. I am a single daughter of my step-mother back there in Rwanda ( because I am from a polygamous family ). I grew up in Rwanda my country there I had my college certificate and I was admitted into the University there I did my one year curse in business management before the political crisis in my country began. My father was killed by some rebels during the war, they accused my father of coup attempt, and I lost my mother during the war also and so many of my family members our house was burnt down, I lost all my important documents like / international passport / Birth Certificate / University ID card.


 I am constrained to contact you because of the maltreatment I am receiving from my step mother in Rwanda since the death of my parents. She planned to take away all my late father's treasury and properties from me since the unexpected death of my beloved parents.


 So, I decided to run away to any African country so I had to run to where I am presently seeking asylum under the Private charity organization for the UN Refugees here in Dakar, Republic of Senegal. I wish to contact you personally for a long term relationship that may lead us to somewhere better if we work well on it.


 My late father of blessed memory deposited the sum of (US$4,200, 000.00)( four Million two Hundred Thousand Dollars ) in one of the leading Banks in Europe with my name as the next of kin. However, I shall forward you the contact information of the bank in Europe and some documents for your confirmation in your acceptance to assist me for the transfer and investment of the fund. As you will help me in an investment, and I will like to complete my studies under you, as I was in my 1st year in the university, when the crisis started.


 After the transaction you will arrange for my trip to join you over there in your country for us to share this feelings face to face.


 We will invest the fund, or if you don't intend staying with me then It will be my pleasure to compensate you out of the total money for your services and the balance shall be my investment capital. This is the reason why I decided to contact you. Please all communications should be through this email address only, for confidential purposes.


 As soon as I receive your positive response showing your interest I will put things into action immediately. In the light of the above, I shall appreciate an urgent message indicating your ability and willingness to handle this relationship and transaction sincerely.


 Awaiting your urgent and positive response. Please do keep this only to your self please I beg you not to disclose it to anyone until I come over to your country once the fund has been transferred.


 Meanwhile the name of the Reverend father that I am using his computer to send this messages to you is Rev Nicholas faith, his Telephone number is (+221 778788003)  you can call him today and tell him to call me so that you can talk to me please because I want to hear your voice but don't tell him anything about the money, for security reasons, I trust only you and no body else.


Just tell him that you want to speak with Loveth Hutu from Rwanda because there are so many other Nationalities who has one problem or the other in the camp here. God bless you.


Awaiting to hear from you soonest!


Yours forever in love,


Miss Loveth.

messages.body:
14th Jan, Loveth Hutu to Mykwile Amzizadique


Hello Dearest One,


I thank you once again this day for your reply to my mails despite your busy schedules in your day to day activities. I will also like to see you face to face and will use this opportunity to let you know that you have been chosen amongst men to help me out from this dungeon despite the little time we have communicated with each other. It is now left for you and God who chooses you to be my deliverer from this predicament I found myself into.


I know you are the man I am going to depend and trust on in my life. I am not going to trust any other man on earth as far as I am still existing. So needless of looking for another partner, you can also adopt me as your daughter if you wish.


 Please I have not told anyone except you about the existence of this money and i will like you to please keep it secret to other people because since it is ( MONEY) all eyes will be on it.


 Remember I trust you that is why I am giving you all this information!. I will like you to call the Rev today and tell him that you want to speak with me and he will send for me immediately. You can call the Reverend today through his phone number ( +221 778788003 ) or his email add ( rev_nicholasfaith@yahoo.com )  his name is Reverend Nicholas Faith and ask him the best time to call me.


 I have informed the bank about my plans to claim this money and the only thing they told me is to look for a foreign partner who will stand on my behalf due to my refugee status and the laws of this country. You will have 18% of the total money for helping me and the remaining money will be managed by you in any business of your choice.


 In this regard I will like you to contact the bank immediately with this information. Tell them that you are my foreign partner and that you want to know the possibilities of assisting me in transferring the ( $4.2 Million US Dollars ) deposited by my late father of which I am the next of kin.


The contact information of the bank is as follows:


 ( CLYDESDALE BANK PLC (GLASGOW IN SCOTLAND )


Email address ( info@clydesdalebankplc-uk.tk ) OR ( operations@clydesdalebankplc-uk.tk ) The name of the transfer manager is Mr JOHN WOOD Banking Hrs 730 am to 5.0 clock pm daily:London time


Telephone contact number   ( +44-7024065466 )
Acc Number: (CBPLC 745008901546/QB/91/A)
Depositor's Name:DR Salman Hutu from (Rwanda).


 Contact them now on how to transfer the $4.2 million Dollars deposited by my late father of which I am the next of kin.


I have mapped out 18% for your assistance and 7% for any expenses that might come up in this transfer. My dear I am glad that God has brought you to see me out from this situation and I promised to be kind and will equally need you in every area of my life plus investing this money since I am still too young to manage this amount of money.


 As I told you before, this camp is just like a prison and my prayers is to move out from here as soon as possible. Please make sure that you contact the bank so that after the transfer you can send some money from that money for me to prepare my traveling documents to meet with you in your country.


Awaiting to hear from you soonest!.


Yours Forever in love,

messages.body:
14th Jan, Nigel Ryan-Schama to Loveth Hutu


Loveth dearest, why have you not replied to me ? I am so lonely and sad here in the hospital, and still in alot of pain. First the reverend gave up on you and me, and now you seem to be giving up on me ??? Loveth, the only thing that's kept me going the last coupla weeks is looking at your photo, reading and re-reading your messages, and dreaming about our future together. Please write a long message to me telling me about the things I asked. Hey, did you see that Leopold Messy won the Balloon Door ?  He's won it EVERY SINGLE YEAR since it started. Can you believe that ? What a guy ! What a hero !!! I can't wait until you are here in the west and we can watch the Barcelona squad every day on my 4" Yakuza LCD TV system. Darling, i told you that I have bee nin contact with  who is also in Dakar Senegal. He says he has been in touch with you and he really thinks he can help me help him to help me help you us. What do you think ? His writing is a little strange but he seems honourable and trustworthy, what do you think ? He told me today that he is also a minister of religion so maybe he can help you in your faith, now that the charlatan Reverend Nicholas Faith has abandoned us. What do you think ?


 Do write back soonest darling.


 GO BARCA ! GO BARCA ! GO BARCA !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!


 Kindest regards
Nigel Ryan-Schama

messages.body:
19th Jan, Nigel Ryan-Schama to Loveth Hutu


Loveth dearest I'm sorry for not replying sooner. I am still in hospital, on a lot of painkilling drugs, and sometimes I'm out for a day at a time or more. Plus I can't always get access to a computer here.


Anyway, I have to clear up a few things.


1) I like you. I like you al ot. Ever since we have been talking o nthe computer I am liking you more and more. So much so that I really believe we have a future together as man and wife.


2) In my country it is essential that a man who wants to take a woman as his wife knows whether or not she has been with other men. If things are different in Dakar Senegal, then I am sorry, but that is the way things are here in the USA, and I can only behave according to the strict moral rules of my country.


3) In my country it is utterly forbidden for a man to ask a woman directly if she has been with other men. This would be considered shockingly offensive and rude, so no one ever does it.


4) To get round this, it is normal here in the USA for a man to ask someone who knows the woman, whether or not she has been with other men. Usually here in America this is the woman's pastor or priest or minister. But it maybe someone else, such as her mother, her father, her brother, perhaps her children, or another local dignitary such as the mayor, a policeman, a realtor, or a mountebank. Again, if things are different in Dakar Senegal then I am sorry but I can only go by what is the tradition here in the USA.


5) So naturally, I thought that asking the reverend Nicholas Faith about your virginity was a sensible thing to do. Obviously I told him that he must not mention it to you, to avoid embarassing you. But what an idiot he is ! First he got angry with me ! ME ! of ALL people !!! I'm the one who is going to SAVE YOU from that refugee camp !!! How could he be angry with ME ????!!!!!!!????? And THEN, he TOLD YOU ABOUT IT !!! What a MORON !!!! Loveth dearest, I have told him that I think he is a lackey of LUCIFER, with Satan's blood running through his veins. I have told him that I will have nothing more to do with him. If he contacts me again, I will ignore him.


6) I have also told him that YOU should shun him too, because of his evil heart, his satanic motives. And his dirty rotten morals.


7) Loveth, I really think  can help you. I don't know if you've met him yet but he assures me that he has been in contact with you and he can help you. As he is also a reverend minister of God, it would be best I think if you can rely on him instead of that fool Reverend Nicholas Faith. Barrister Mykwile certainly writes in a strange way but he has been trustworthy with me so far.


8) Loveth, dearest, the main thing is the answer to the question that I asked Reverend Faith. I'm sorry that you have had to answer it, but now that you have, I am delighted, and the way is clear for us to proceed with getting you out of that refugee camp.


What's next darling ?


Kindest regards
 Nigel Ryan-Schama

messages.body:
27th Jan, Nigel Ryan-Schama to Loveth Hutu


I'm so happy. You simply can not imagine how happy I am. It is important that we get married as soon as possible, as I could die any day now. If I die before I get married, I will have no heirs and the US government will take my home, my car, and all my money. I would like it to go to you, but that can only happen if we are married. I have arranged with  for him to carry out a marriage ceremony via the internet. Reverend Mykwile (Barrister) assures me that an internet wedding is legal in Dakar Senegal as a temporary marriage certificate, valid for one year, good in all jurisdictions around the world. We then simply need to go through a face to face marriage ceremony when we eventually meet, and make sure we do this within one (1) year. This could be in Dakar Senegal, here in USA, or maybe even in Barcelona ! What do you think ? Anyway, if you are agreeable, I will get Reverend Mykwile to begin the ceremony.


 Kindest Regards
Nigel Ryan-Schama

messages.body:
28th Jan, Nigel Ryan-Schama to Loveth Hutu


Loveth darling what are you talking about ? I need you now more than ever before ! I'm sorry if you think I'm ignoring you. But you must know that the reason I can't send you food or money right now is because I'M IN HOSPITAL ! Don't you remember ? I haven't been out of this accursed bed for weeks now. I have a fractured skull, broken leg, broken collar bone, punctured lung, two broken ribs, and now I have pneumonia following the surgery the other day. You know all this. So how can you expect me to send you money and food ? Believe me I want nothing more than to rescue you from your plight. I think really your plight has been worsened by relying on that idiot reverend nicholas faith. If he cares for you, why can't he feed you ? I know why, because he is a selfish ignorant lazy buffoon, with Satan's blood running through his veins. Loveth, don't you see that marrying you is the best way for me to help you right now ? I could die any day now, and if that happens, you will get nothing. I don't want that to happen. I want you to be cared for if I die, and that will only happen if you are my wife, and then you can inherit my home, my car, and my bank accounts. I will ask Reverend Mykwile to begin the marriage ceremony. Please co-operate with him fully. Please believe me darling, if I don't die then as soon as I get out of hospital I will be able to send some money to you to help tide you over with any day to day financial requirements. And how can you say I don't want to hear about you ? Go back to my earlier messages - I have asked you many many times to send me long messages telling me about you, about your life, about how things are in the refugee camp. Please continue to do that darling.


 Kindest regards.
Nigel Ryan-Schama

messages.body:
4th Feb, Nigel Ryan-Schama to Loveth Hutu


Loveth, I just don't know what to say.


 Go back to my message that I sent you on 5th January, in which I told you about my car crash and my injuries. I still have ALL those injuries, PLUS the pneumonia I told you about the other day. I've also been told I have a fractured labia and a distended scamula which they didn't even notice at first because I was so messed up. I'm STILL in the bed that I've been in for more than a month. I have pipes and tubes coming out of my nose, my neck, my armpit, my butt, my chest, and possibly some I don't even know about. BOTH legs are in traction. Tell me please, HOW CAN I SEND YOU MONEY OR FOOD IF I CAN'T MOVE ? Believe me darling, I would love to send you stuff, but I just can't right now. The docs say I could be in bed for at least a month, maybe two. It will be at least 6 months before I can walk again. Oh yeah, that's if I don't die first, because the pneumonia is REAL BAD, so bad I could die tomorrow.


 Loveth, you need to see sense. If you need money or food urgently, that dumbass Nicholas Faith should be looking after you, and if he won't, then that is proof he is no good for you. I will help you with money and food as soon as I can, but it will be at least a month and possibly two (2).


 I want to marry you for two reasons. I can't believe I'm having to explain all this again, it really is SO SIMPLE. Reason 1 - I love you and you love me. That is all the reason we need, we shouldn't need any more. Reason 2 - if I die before we get married, ALL my money and property will be taken by the US government and you will get NOTHING !!! Do you really want that ? The only way to make sure that you get my money and property if I die tomorrow is to marry me TODAY ! If you don't like Reverend Barrister Mykwile, that's your privilege. But does it really matter ? You don't have to meet him Just send him an e-mail with two little words. And if you can't even do that, then by all means, find your own reverend to carry out the temporary marriage ceremony. But PLEASE Loveth, either reply to Mykwile TODAY, or get your own reverend (NOT Nicholas Faith) on the case TODAY because there is a great chance I will die tomorrow.


 Loveth, please don't break my heart, let's get married immediately to secure your future.


 Kindest regards
Nigel Ryan-Schama

messages.body:
13th Feb, Nigel Ryan-Schama to Rev. Emmanuel


Dear Reverend Emmanuel, maybe Loveth has not explained this to you but I AM IN HOSPITAL. I have been in hospital, in the very same bed, for nearly 2 months now, and I don't expect to get out again for at least 6 months. The only way I'll get out of here before then is if I die and they carry me out in a coffin. I have two broken legs, punctured lung, many fractured ribs, and about 10 tubes connected to various parts of my body. Plus lots more injuries too numerous to mention. There is absolutely no way that I can send you any money at all while I am stuck in this bed hooked up to all these pipes. If I COULD send you money, I wouldn't need to - I'd be able to send it to Loveth directly to enable her to buy some food. The whole point of us getting married is to protect Loveth's future, so that if I die soon then my home, my money, my car, will go to Loveth and not the US government. If I die before I get married, the US government will take everything and Loveth will get nothing. I am due to get more fatal surgery tomorrow, so believe me my friend, there is no time to waste.


 Can you marry us without me paying you in advance, YES or NO ?


If NO, then I need to find someone else to marry us.


If YES, please GET ON WITH IT !!!

 Thank you andKindest regards
 Nigel Ryan-Schama

messages.body:
14th Feb, Reverend Frankelle Baum to Nigel Ryan-Schama


Dear Mr Ryan-Schama


 I am writing to confirm the details of our conversation at your bedside this morning.


Yes, of course we can carry out a temporary marriage ceremony via E-mail.


This kind of thing is actually quite common - I carried out two such ceremonies last year.


In the first case, the bride was very very ill but she has since made a full recovery and I understand the happy couple are intending to confirm their temporary marriage with a full wedding later this year, which apparently I am to be invited to - isn't that swell ?


Sadly in the second case the groom passed away shortly after the temporary ceremony, but the Seattle State Attorney recognised the ceremony as legitimate and the bride was able to inherit his estate, just as he wished. I understand that is a concern for you too, am i right ?


 Like I say, this kind of thing is quite common, it goes on across the USA and I think it happens in many other countries too.


 The process is extremely simple, I will just ask each of you a simple question via e-mail, and if you reply "I DO" then I will pronounce you married, with a temporary marriage certificate.


This will be valid for one year, then if you go through a full ceremony in the next 12 months, you're married completely.


 There are no fees whatsoever, and I will issue a certificate the same day that the marriage is completed.


 Do let me know when you are ready to proceed.


 Good luck sir !


 Reverend Frankelle Baum,


Chaplain, Seattle Grace Hospital, Seattle

messages.body:
19th Feb, Reverend Frankelle Baum to Loveth Hutu


Dear Miss Hutu


 You don't know me but you may have heard my name. I am Reverend Frankelle Baum, and I am the Duty Chaplain here at Seattle Grace Hospital.


 One of the patients here, Mr Nigel Ryan Schama, has told me a little about you, and how he intends to marry you in order to make you financially secure.


 I have to tell you that Mr Schama is very very ill now.


 He was in theater on Sunday for major surgery, and he has been in a coma ever since.


 I have spent some hours at his bedside yesterday and today, praying for his deliverance.
 But he has said nothing, apart from your name once or twice.


 Honey, I don't know you, and I don't really know Mr Schama that well, although I have got to know him a little bit over the last few weeks.


 He is truly a wonderful man, the spirit of our lord runs deep in him !


 He has spoken about you a great deal.


 Anyway, I don't know you, so I don't really know whether you should marry Mr Schama or not.
 But honey, if you do have any intention to marry him, then believe me, now is the time to do it.


 The doctors and nurses are pretty certain that Mr Schama will die this week.


 I have prayed and prayed for him, but sometimes the good lord wants to take the best people for himself, as I'm sure you know.


 I can issue you both with a temporary marriage certificate.


 If Mr Schama does die this week, I can then put you in touch with the Seattle City Attorney and he will begin the process of transferring his estate to you.


 There are no fees for the temporary marriage certificate, and I will issue it as soon as you and he can reply to a couple of simple questions.


 Mr Schama told me that he is worried that if you are not married, all of his property will go to the US government.


 That is indeed what will happen if you are not married.


 Anyway its up to you.
 If you would like to proceed with the ceremony, just let me know.


 If you have sent messages to Mr Schama in the last couple of days he will not have seen them and won't have been able to reply to them.


 Be blessed, sister.


Frankelle Baum
Seattle Grace Hospital

messages.body:
21st Feb, Rev. Frankelle Baum to Loveth Hutu


Dear Miss Hutu


 I'm afraid I have some extremely sad news.


 Mister Ryan Schama passed away peacefully  this morning, as a result of his injuries and the fatal surgery he underwent.


 I am so sorry to have to break the news of his death to you in this way.


 It is heartbreaking that you never got to marry him, I am so sad and it seems as if you are now doomed to rot in that awful refugee camp.


 The Seattle City Attorney is starting to dispose of his estate - if you would like me to try and put in a claim on the estate on your behalf, let me know.


 Yours in confident hope of the glorious resurrection


 Reverend Frankelle Baum


Seattle Grace Hospital

messages.body:
23rd Feb, Loveth Hutu to Rev. Frankelle Baum


Hello Dear,


How was your night over there in your country, I believe you had a nice night and that the atmosphere over there in your country is very nice today? Mine is a little bit warm over here in Dakar Senegal. 



My name is Loveth I am (24) but age doesn't matter in a real relationship, so I am comfortable with your age, I am from Rwanda in East Africa,5.4ft tall, fair in complexion single, (never married) and presently I am residing here in Dakar as a result of the civil war that was fought  in my country some years ago.


My late father Dr Salman Hutu was a politician and the managing director of a Gold & Mine Ind in Kigali (the capital of Rwanda) before the rebels attacked our house one early morning and killed my mother and my father in cold blood.


It was only me that is alive now and I managed to make my way to a near by country Senegal where I am leaving now as a refugee under a Reverend father's care and I am using his computer to send these message to you.


I would like to know more about you. Your likes and dislikes, your hobbies and what you are doing presently. I will tell you more about myself in my next mail. Attached here is my picture. I will also like to see yours today!


Hopping to hear from you soonest,


Yours forever,


Miss Loveth.

messages.body:
25th Feb, Loveth Hutu to Rev. Frankelle Baum


Dearest one,


I thank you for your response to my mail; in-line with the message I sent to you. Do not be surprise or get offended for receiving this message from me please, Its just that I have been obliged to lay a mere trust on you due to my situation here as a refugee and I will require the best of your honesty after your knowing about me. I will really like us to have a good relationship in spite of anything because I have this feeling that you are not going to betray me at the end.


 I contact you because of the urgency of my situation here in the refugee camp. I am a single daughter of my step-mother back there in Rwanda ( because I am from a polygamous family ). I grew up in Rwanda my country there I had my college certificate and I was admitted into the University there I did my one year curse in business management before the political crisis in my country began. My father was killed by some rebels during the war, they accused my father of coup attempt, and I lost my mother during the war also and so many of my family members our house was burnt down, I lost all my important documents like / international passport / Birth Certificate / University ID card.


 I am constrained to contact you because of the maltreatment I am receiving from my step mother in Rwanda since the death of my parents. She planned to take away all my late father's treasury and properties from me since the unexpected death of my beloved parents.


 So, I decided to run away to any African country so I had to run to where I am presently seeking asylum under the Private charity organization for the UN Refugees here in Dakar, Republic of Senegal. I wish to contact you personally for a long term relationship that may lead us to somewhere better if we work well on it.


 My late father of blessed memory deposited the sum of (US$4,200, 000.00)( four Million two Hundred Thousand Dollars ) in one of the leading Banks in Europe with my name as the next of kin. However, I shall forward you the contact information of the bank in Europe and some documents for your confirmation in your acceptance to assist me for the transfer and investment of the fund. As you will help me in an investment, and I will like to complete my studies under you, as I was in my 1st year in the university, when the crisis started.


 After the transaction you will arrange for my trip to join you over there in your country for us to share this feelings face to face.


 We will invest the fund, or if you don't intend staying with me then It will be my pleasure to compensate you out of the total money for your services and the balance shall be my investment capital. This is the reason why I decided to contact you. Please all communications should be through this email address only, for confidential purposes.


 As soon as I receive your positive response showing your interest I will put things into action immediately. In the light of the above, I shall appreciate an urgent message indicating your ability and willingness to handle this relationship and transaction sincerely.


 Awaiting your urgent and positive response. Please do keep this only to your self please I beg you not to disclose it to anyone until I come over to your country once the fund has been transferred.


 Meanwhile the name of the Reverend father that I am using his computer to send this messages to you is Rev Nicholas faith, his Telephone number is (+221 778788003)  you can call him today and tell him to call me so that you can talk to me please because I want to hear your voice but don't tell him anything about the money, for security reasons, I trust only you and no body else.

messages.raw:
25th Feb, Loveth Hutu to Rev. Frankelle Baum

Dearest one,

I thank you for your response to my mail; in-line with the message I sent to you. Do not be surprise or get offended for receiving this message from me please, Its just that I have been obliged to lay a mere trust on you due to my situation here as a refugee and I will require the best of your honesty after your knowing about me. I will really like us to have a good relationship in spite of anything because I have this feeling that you are not going to betray me at the end.

I contact you because of the urgency of my situation here in the refugee camp. I am a single daughter of my step-mother back there in Rwanda ( because I am from a polygamous family ). I grew up in Rwanda my country there I had my college certificate and I was admitted into the University there I did my one year curse in business management before the political crisis in my country began. My father was killed by some rebels during the war, they accused my father of coup attempt, and I lost my mother during the war also and so many of my family members our house was burnt down, I lost all my important documents like / international passport / Birth Certificate / University ID card.

I am constrained to contact you because of the maltreatment I am receiving from my step mother in Rwanda since the death of my parents. She planned to take away all my late father's treasury and properties from me since the unexpected death of my beloved parents.

So, I decided to run away to any African country so I had to run to where I am presently seeking asylum under the Private charity organization for the UN Refugees here in Dakar, Republic of Senegal. I wish to contact you personally for a long term relationship that may lead us to somewhere better if we work well on it.

My late father of blessed memory deposited the sum of (US$4,200, 000.00)( four Million two Hundred Thousand Dollars ) in one of the leading Banks in Europe with my name as the next of kin. However, I shall forward you the contact information of the bank in Europe and some documents for your confirmation in your acceptance to assist me for the transfer and investment of the fund. As you will help me in an investment, and I will like to complete my studies under you, as I was in my 1st year in the university, when the crisis started.

After the transaction you will arrange for my trip to join you over there in your country for us to share this feelings face to face.

We will invest the fund, or if you don't intend staying with me then It will be my pleasure to compensate you out of the total money for your services and the balance shall be my investment capital. This is the reason why I decided to contact you. Please all communications should be through this email address only, for confidential purposes.

As soon as I receive your positive response showing your interest I will put things into action immediately. In the light of the above, I shall appreciate an urgent message indicating your ability and willingness to handle this relationship and transaction sincerely.

Awaiting your urgent and positive response. Please do keep this only to your self please I beg you not to disclose it to anyone until I come over to your country once the fund has been transferred.

Meanwhile the name of the Reverend father that I am using his computer to send this messages to you is Rev Nicholas faith, his Telephone number is (+221 778788003) you can call him today and tell him to call me so that you can talk to me please because I want to hear your voice but don't tell him anything about the money, for security reasons, I trust only you and no body else.

Just tell him that you want to speak with Loveth Hutu from Rwanda because there are so many other Nationalities who has one problem or the other in the camp here. God bless you.

Awaiting to hear from you soonest!

Yours forever in love,

Miss Loveth.

messages.body:
25th Feb, Rev. Frankelle Baum to Loveth Hutu


Honey, once again, you've sent me a message that I don't think was meant for me.


 My name is Reverend Frankelle Baum, and I am the duty chaplain at Seattle Grace Hospital, don't you remember me ?


 I am contacting you about the later My N Ryan Schama, who died recently after be-friending you.


 I can help you put in a claim with the Seattle City Attorney's office for a payout from Mr Ryan-Schama's estate.


 If you wanna do that, let me know, but hurry because I don't know when the closing date for claims is.


 If you don't wanna do that, that's OK too, and I wish you God's blessing in that rat-infested refugee camp.


 Honey, I know you meant a lot to Mr Ryan-Schama and I'm sure you are even more upset by his death than I am.


 But please, try to wipe away the tears of mourning from your beautiful eyes and focus, focus, focus on the important things !


 Yours in faith


 Reverend Frankelle Baum
Seattle Grace Hospital

messages.body:
26th Feb, Loveth Hutu to Rev. Frankelle Baum


Hello Dearest One,


I thank you once again this day for your reply to my mails despite your busy schedules in your day to day activities. I will also like to see you face to face and will use this opportunity to let you know that you have been chosen amongst men to help me out from this dungeon despite the little time we have communicated with each other. It is now left for you and God who chooses you to be my deliverer from this predicament I found myself into.


I know you are the man I am going to depend and trust on in my life. I am not going to trust any other man on earth as far as I am still existing. So needless of looking for another partner, you can also adopt me as your daughter if you wish.


 Please I have not told anyone except you about the existence of this money and i will like you to please keep it secret to other people because since it is ( MONEY) all eyes will be on it.


 Remember I trust you that is why I am giving you all this information!. I will like you to call the Rev today and tell him that you want to speak with me and he will send for me immediately. You can call the Reverend today through his phone number ( +221 778788003 ) or his email add ( rev_nicholasfaith@yahoo.com )  his name is Reverend Nicholas Faith and ask him the best time to call me.


 I have informed the bank about my plans to claim this money and the only thing they told me is to look for a foreign partner who will stand on my behalf due to my refugee status and the laws of this country. You will have 18% of the total money for helping me and the remaining money will be managed by you in any business of your choice.


 In this regard I will like you to contact the bank immediately with this information. Tell them that you are my foreign partner and that you want to know the possibilities of assisting me in transferring the ( $4.2 Million US Dollars ) deposited by my late father of which I am the next of kin.


The contact information of the bank is as follows:


 ( CLYDESDALE BANK PLC (GLASGOW IN SCOTLAND )


Email address ( info@clydesdalebankplc-uk.tk ) OR ( operations@clydesdalebankplc-uk.tk ) The name of the transfer manager is Mr JOHN WOOD Banking Hrs 730 am to 5.0 clock pm daily:London time


Telephone contact number   ( +44-7024065466 )
Acc Number: (CBPLC 745008901546/QB/91/A)
Depositor's Name:DR Salman Hutu from (Rwanda).


 Contact them now on how to transfer the $4.2 million Dollars deposited by my late father of which I am the next of kin.


I have mapped out 18% for your assistance and 7% for any expenses that might come up in this transfer. My dear I am glad that God has brought you to see me out from this situation and I promised to be kind and will equally need you in every area of my life plus investing this money since I am still too young to manage this amount of money.


 As I told you before, this camp is just like a prison and my prayers is to move out from here as soon as possible. Please make sure that you contact the bank so that after the transfer you can send some money from that money for me to prepare my traveling documents to meet with you in your country.


Awaiting to hear from you soonest!.


Yours Forever in love,


Miss Loveth.

Honey, please, stop sending me these ridiculous messages !


 I know you're in a desparate situation over there but I can't help you with any of that nonsense.


 There is only one question I want you to answer.


 Do you want to try and make a claim for a payout from the estate of the late Mr Ryan-Schama ?


 Yes or no ?


 Yours in faith


 Reverend Frankelle Baum
Seattle Grace Hospital

messages.body:
27th March, Rev. Frankelle Baum to Loveth Hutu


Loveth, child, it pains me to say this for as you know I am a reverend working here in the hospital, and we are forbidden from talking harshly. But child, SHUT UP YOUR FACE for a minute ya DUMB TONKY and READ WHAT I WROTE TO YOU !!!


 I'm not interested in contacting your bank. Get over it. Don't bother me with this nonsense again.


 All I care about is fulfilling Mr Nigel Ryan-Schama's dying wishes that you should be taken care of. The only way that I can do this is to help you put in a claim with the Seattle City Attorney's Office on Mr Ryan-Schama's estate. As I said the other day, the estate is very well endowed.


 If you're interested in filing a claim, I can help you do that.


If you're not, just say so, and we both can move on with our lives, maybe you can find someone else to contact the bank, and I might try and find someone more deserving of Mr Ryan-Schama's money.


 May the saints forgive me for my anger, and may the saints forgive you for your bone-headed stupidity.


 Yours in faith


 Reverend Frankelle Baum
Seattle Grace Hospital


And that was it. No more since then.
